amendment.description: Amendment to clarify that nothing in the bill can limit the EPA Administrator's authority to regulate a pipeline that crosses a streambed.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 112-144 to clarify that nothing in the bill can limit the EPA Administrator's authority to regulate a pipeline that crosses a streambed.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Cohen.
